title: Vouchers hub — master/template lists (e.g. Ontopo, Movies & Shows) can be deleted from main menu
root_cause: Unknown — delete action is exposed on master/template lists in the Vouchers hub main menu. These lists should not be deletable by the user (or should require confirmation and be protected as templates).
steps_to_reproduce: 3. Observe the list of voucher lists (e.g. Ontopo, Movies & Shows)
4. A delete option is visible/accessible on these lists
5. User can delete them from the main vouchers menu
